title: Italian sausage pasta bake
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack tortiglioni pasta', '450g Italian sausage, casings removed', '2 (600g) jars tomato pasta sauce', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil, divided', '340g ricotta cheese', '1 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, divided', 'salt and pepper to taste', '450g mozzarella cheese, grated']
